citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Protocol 2023-01 was approved by the IACUC however the Principal investigator(PI) was not notified in writing of the
decision. The approval, which occurred at the IACUC meeting in March 2024, had been documented on the IACUC
meeting minutes however the decision was not made in writing to the PI or the research facility.
The IACUC shall notify the Principal Investigators and the research facility in writing of its decision to approve or withhold
approval of those activities related to the care and use of animals.
*********Correct by August 1, 2024 and for all further IACUC protocol approvals

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
IACUC approved protocol 2023-01 referenced a specific facility SOP, however the date of the most recent complete
review was 5/4/19. The IACUC shall conduct complete reviews of activities at appropriate intervals but not less than every
3 years. A complete review of all facility SOP's and animal use protocols utilizing USDA covered species must be
conducted at least at a frequency adhering to the required intervals.
********Correct by September 1, 2024 or next IACUC meeting
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(d)(4) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Protocol 2023-01 was approved by the IACUC however the Principal investigator(PI) was not notified in writing of the 
decision. The approval, which occurred at the IACUC meeting in March 2024, had been documented on the IACUC 
meeting minutes however the decision was not made in writing to the PI or the research facility.  
The IACUC shall notify the Principal Investigators and the research facility in writing of its decision to approve or withhold 
approval of those activities related to the care and use of animals.  
*********Correct by August 1, 2024 and for all further IACUC protocol approvals 
2.31(d)(5) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
IACUC approved protocol 2023-01 referenced a specific facility SOP, however the date of the most recent complete 
review was 5/4/19. The IACUC shall conduct complete reviews of activities at appropriate intervals but not less than every 
3 years. A complete review of all facility SOP's and animal use protocols utilizing USDA covered species must be 
conducted at least at a frequency adhering to the required intervals.  
********Correct by September 1, 2024 or next IACUC meeting 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
